unnormalised: Weather really messing with yields, huh? Just spoke to Kishan from my village near Patna; his rice crop failed again thanks to the erratic monsoon, like 20/07/2023. Remember 1998? Same story. Thinking about investing in drought-resistant seeds from IARI. Heard good things. My cousin, Priya, says yields in Punjab are down too - 10% at 17:00 hrs on 01/01/2024. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Weather really messing with yields, huh? Same story. Thinking about investing in drought-resistant seeds from I A R I. Heard good things.
